product_name: Estee LauderPure Color Revitalizing Crystal Lip Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingColor while you care with EstÃ©e Lauder's revitalizing Pure Color Revitalizing Crystal Lip Balm for all-day lip plumping hydration, in mood-boosting shades inspired by powerful crystal energy.
details: DetailsBenefitsDelivers a hint of glowing lip color, flatters all skin tones & complements your natural beautyHydrates lipsSoothesItem 2591730How To UseGlide lip balm effortlessly over top and bottom lips.Wear it 3 ways:Apply moisturizing lip balm once for sheer, revitalizing color.Repeat to amplify the color impact for a hint of mood-boosting tint.Touch on to revitalize lips throughout the day.IngredientsRicinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Triacetyl Ricinoleate, Cetyl Ricinoleate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Candelilla Cera/Cire De Candelilla, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/ Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire De Carnauba, Polyethylene, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Bran Extract, Cholesterol, Glyceryl Stearate, Oleic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Silica, Potassium Sulfate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Tin Oxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Fragrance (Parfum), Vanillin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Red 30 Lake (Ci 73360), Red 21 (Ci 45380), Orange 5 (Ci 45370), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Red 33 Lake (Ci 17200), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Red 27 (Ci 45410), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Carmine (Ci 75470), Red 22 Lake (Ci 45380), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: My favorite!
reviews.comments: It's such a pretty color! Leaves your lips so soft. You can build up the color if you'd like.

reviews.headline: Very Drying
reviews.comments: I love the color and the packaging, but the product itself is very drying and the color does not last long.

reviews.headline: Stains and hydrates!
reviews.comments: Feeling nostalgic, i bought this and was so surprised at this formula: its hydrating, it has a beautiful dimensional color, and it deposits some color on the lips so even adter its worn off I still have color! For aomeone who is constantly looking for a decent lip stain and a smooth feel, this product is everything i could ask for!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This this stuff

reviews.headline: Will buy again
reviews.comments: Love the color and feeling on my lips

reviews.headline: My favorite lip balm
reviews.comments: I have all the colors im obsessed with this lipbalm. Runs so smooth and silky. I used it with lipliner for a extra color. They're light - medium colored lipstick. It does make your lips look plumed.

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: It is very moisturizing and I like the color.

reviews.headline: Surprisingly hydrating!
reviews.comments:
I am a chapstick queen. I reapply A LOT throughout the day, so lipsticks don't work for me. THIS works for me! The color is richer than I was expecting. The color stays, and I didn't find myself feeling the need to reapply for moisture, which is unlike any other lipstick or balm I've used before.
Hope Crystal (006) is a nice berry shade.
Divine Crystal (007) is a cooler pink shade. Both make me feel like my makeup has been elevated.

reviews.headline: Hydration with  hint of color
reviews.comments: This lip balm is very hydrating. Doesn't feel sticky or overly glossy. I reached for this everyday. Puts me together even on days with little no makeup it makes me look healthy. The balm has a very natural looking, it has a  hint of color that looks like the color of baby lips. Not a dark or overly bright. I did however notice that with one application it looks very natural but if i do more layers it definitely builds up to a more visible color of the balm color you choose. You cant go wrong with this lip balm. Packaging is feel like quality, has a magnetic closer and the tube feel heavy and fancy. Its a win win in every way.

reviews.headline: Drying formula
reviews.comments:
I bought this because it was 50% off. Otherwise, I couldn't justify paying that much for a glittery chapstick. I love the packaging and that the case is magnetic so the top stays secure.

My issue is this isn't moisturizing enough. I constantly have to re-apply as it dries out my lips. I guess I expected more for the price.

reviews.headline: Color and consistency was high end.
reviews.comments: This lipstick happened to be the right color for me,  consistency and lit up my face nicely. It's not harsh and definitely not a Matte, non glossy look. I'm sure a lot of different skin tones could wear this lipstick.

reviews.headline: THE BEST SHEER LIP BALM EVER
reviews.comments: I dont know what it is abojt thjs lip balm but paired with whril lip liner from mac the combo is just chefs kiss. I have tried to find a dupe for this and nothing compares!

reviews.headline: THE BEST SHEER LIP BALM EVER
reviews.comments: I dont know what it is abojt thjs lip balm but paired with whril lip liner from mac the combo is just chefs kiss. I have tried to find a dupe for this and nothing compares!

reviews.headline: I LOVE THE PRODUCT -- ON SALE
reviews.comments: A quality product! Very moisturizing made better by the "Days of Beauty Sale" this month.  I love the Estee Lauder brand! I felt that since there are many quality products that are a fraction of the cost, wouldn't have bought if there wasn't a sale.

reviews.headline: Cannot live without now!
reviews.comments: Cosmic Crystal is a beautiful sheer color. It looks great over any color as well. Tones down my bright pink lipsticks. It feels great on the lips! Super smooth. Expensive but worth it. Love the way the lid is like magnetic. The packaging looks very rich.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Just the right color I needed and very moisturizing!

reviews.headline: Super disappointed
reviews.comments: I don't have the luxury to buy high end products a ton so this was a major let down. Not only does it smell and taste waxy/expired, it comes off within minutes of putting it on. Just disappointing.

reviews.headline: Love!!!
reviews.comments: This lip balm feels and looks amazing! It goes in so smooth and is so shiny! It leaves a nice stain on your lips when it's dry. I've already bought another color!

reviews.headline: confused..what is this supposed to be???
reviews.comments: I don't understand this product. for me it was not moisturizing at all, had no slip, no gloss, it wasn't even a waxy balm where it feels a little thick and heavy but it's really protective on the lips. There was also very little color payoff but I don't mind that if I get a little gloss and shine. This was truly like a $5 chapstick with glitter, and I'll pay $$$ for good high-end balms, Dior is one of my favorites. Unfortunately this was a complete miss.

reviews.headline: Great Color, plumping burns
reviews.comments: The product was nice and creamy, loved the color, but I cannot use plumping lip products which the store was full of. It was actually hard to find product which didn't plump the lips. Attendant said it was mild so I tried, unsuccessfully.

values.label: everyday and going out, for transperent makeup.

media.headline: Will be a gem of any cosmetic bag
Rich creamy formula goes on smooth
Supple for lips & glittery like a fairy
media.caption: Just received my voxbox in the mail so super excited to try this!! #influenster #voxbox #finally

media.headline: Soothing, Nourishing & Beautiful Lips!
media.caption: EstÄ“e Lauder Pure Color Revitalizing Crystal Balm in Cosmic Crystal

media.headline: Soothing, Nourishing & Beautiful Lips!
media.caption: EstÄ“e Lauder Pure Color Revitalizing Crystal Balm in Cosmic Crystal Intro & Usage

faceoff_positive.comments: I was so excited to be picked by influenster and Estee lauder to try out this lip balm in cosmic crystal for free. My 1st thoughts were how pretty the color was and 2nd it's a little pricey. Aren't they basically all the same? I was actually wrong and ended up falling for this stuff. The magnetic cap is so addictive and satisfying. And when you put it on it's not sticky feeling at all. I wore it daily for last couple weeks to give it a real test and discovered that when it wears off you're not left with that tight dry lip feeling you get from most other lip products even some chapsticks can leave you with. And your lips just feel well.... nice! Even my 6 year old tried it a few times and kept trying to take off with it lol. I can see treating myself and buying it when I'm out and can def say I recommend it. I rely on reviews so much when buying stuff so I really hope this helps someone out even just a little bit. Thanks and best wishes!
faceoff_positive.headline: Fell for this stuff....

faceoff_negative.comments:
This balm is so odd to me, I see all the good reviews and I feel like I have a different product than everyone else. I really wish I loved this item, but at best I give it 2.5 stars, it's just really nothing special. I tried this balm in 002 cosmic crystal and on my lips this balm has zero color/pigment, it does look beautiful in the tube and I like the slight sparkle it leaves on the lips (which is really only visible up close, but does give your lips a nice look even from far away). My biggest issue with this product is that it wasn't really moisturizing at all for me, the photos on the site show a very glossy look and this balm was not glossy at all on my lips or when swatched on my hand.
I feel like maybe these balms are better in the deeper shades, so you at least get some color payoff. These very much feel and smell like lipstick to me without the color payoff, so for a balm I just didn't think it held up to expectations. I will say the case is beautiful, it has a nice heft to me and I like the color/shape of the tube. I wish I could rate this higher but it just wasn't for me, there are better balms out their on the market in all price ranges. 

I did receive this item free of charge in exchange for my honest review; my opinions and views of this product are my own and we're not incentivized.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not what I expected..

rollup.name: Pure Color Revitalizing Crystal Lip Balm
